data.title: What is the official language of Lesotho?
data.meta_description: Sesotho The official language of Kingdom of Lesotho is Sesotho It has another recognized language being English Other than Lesotho Sesotho is the official language of South Africa and Zimbabwe
data.text:
Q. What is the official language of Lesotho?

Answer: Sesotho

Notes: The official language of Kingdom of Lesotho is Sesotho. It has another recognized language being English. Other than Lesotho, Sesotho is the official language of South Africa and Zimbabwe.

6
